00012 ImplementationGroup::ImplementationGroup(QWidget *parent): 
00013 QGroupBox(tr("Implementation"), parent),
00014 hwBox_(tr("HW"), this),
00015 swBox_(tr("SW"), this),
00016 systemBox_(tr("System"), this),
00017 options_() {
00018 
00019         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00020         layout->addWidget(&hwBox_, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00021         layout->addWidget(&swBox_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00022         layout->addWidget(&systemBox_, 0, 2, 1, 1);
00023         layout->setSpacing(0);
00024 
00025         hwBox_.setChecked(true);
00026         swBox_.setChecked(true);
00027         systemBox_.setChecked(true);
00028 
00029         connect(&hwBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00030                 this, SLOT(onHWChanged(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031         connect(&swBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00032                 this, SLOT(onSWChanged(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00033         connect(&systemBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00034                 this, SLOT(onSystemChanged(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00035 }

00040 void ImplementationGroup::onHWChanged( int state ) {
